    • Uses of Square in board

      Subclasses of Square in board 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicSquare
      BasicSquare is the class representing a basic square in the horses game.
      class  BottomStairway
      BottomStairway is the class representing a specific Square in the Horses game.
      class  HorsePen
      HorsePen is the class representing a specific Square in the Horses game.
      class  StairwaySquare
      StairaySquare is the class representing a specific Square in a game of horses.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Square HorsesGame.getNextSquare(Square A)
      Returns the next Square, excluding the horsepen.

      Returns the StairwaySquare which comes after the Square given as parameter.

      Returns the previous Square not including the horspen.
